content: I am going to AIT to reclass as 74D as prior service in July. I was wondering how prior service members in AIT are treated. If anyone has attending 74D AIT as prior service please help me answer some questions. 1) Do I stay in same bay as basic training soliders. 2)Do I have weekends off? 3) Do I get to leave after my work day is done? Any other information would be greatly appreciated. Thanks
